Visually stunning, fast-paced action, and a spine-chilling story. Another Bioshock title that fails to disappoint. A must own for Bioshock fans.
amazing game, amazing story-line, and just amazing in general. i advise this game to anyone who likes a good story.

recomiendo este juego a todas las personas que les encantan los buenos juegos FPS con un toque de poderes, me gusto mucho el estilo de combate y mas que todo el modo 1999 es un modo excelente en el que uno puede tener un buen reto a la hora de jugar.
Loved it!

This game is my love-hate game.  I absolutely love all the bioshock games' stories.  I think they have some of the best stories in all of gaming.  HOWEVER, playing the Bioshock games is something I can't stand to do.  I absolutely hate the gameplay.  Weak feeling weapons and spongey enemies ruin the series, and I don't find plasmids or salts to be any more than renamed spells from other, REAL RPGs.

I recommend watching an entire lets play of this game to get the story, but i wouldn't buy it to play it
You are in for a great ending. This game blew my mind. 10/10 would bang. Love it.

Such a great game with great visuals and fantastic plot. Check it out if you can.... The combat is where the game is really fun and you can have so many different approaches on how you deal with enemys. 10/10

Bioshock Infinite is one of the best modern games that has been made up to date. Bioshock Infinite is a Action-Packed game that is tied with a perfect story, the voice acting is spot on. The gameplay can get a little repeatitive but never to say the least i have really enjoyed the experience that Bioshock Infinite takes you on. with the expansion from the last two games the game has a new enviornment, new enemies and bosses that are protecting all across the floating city of Columbia. This is a game that should not be missed
An absolute blast!

Die Kampagne ist zwar etwas kurz jedoch sehr Abwechslungsreich.
Außerdem hat das Game eines der geilsten Endings die ich je gesehen habe =]
Easily one of my favorite games. 10/10
it's like bioshock but Up

An excellent game that is highlighted by the beautiful art direction seen throughout. You will find yourself stopping at various points to soak in the beauty of Columbia and the various propoganda littered throughout. The ending may leave you thinking about it for days on end afterwards, and is certainly one of the more thought-provoking endings seen in recent memory.

Be sure to stay tuned after the credits roll!

Historia sencillamente perfecta. Gameplay de los mas variado y entretenido. Toma todo lo bueno que tenía el Bioshock original y lo mejora . Calidad gráfica bastante buena, pero poca rejugabilidad lo cual le juega en contra. Uno de mis favoritos de este 2013. Recomendado al 100% si te gustan los juegos de shooter con pinceladas de acción y RPG.

Bioshock Infinite, en un mot " juste exceptionnel "

+ La direction artistique
+ Le scénario
+ Columbia
+ Les personnages ( Elisabeth, Dewitt, Comstock... )
+ Le moteur graphique, très bien optimisé
+ L'ia juste excellente
+ Le gameplay très oldschool
+ La narration
+ La fin de l'histoire
+ Les armes surtout celle des fondateurs
+ Le Sky-line
+ La VF est très bonne
+ La bande son du jeux
+ Le mod 1999
+ Le DLC " les tombaux sous-marins juste grandiose " 

- de temps en temps des zones couloirs mais très rarements
- pas de fin alternative comme sur Bioshock 2
Unbelievable.
My 2013 GOTY

This is an amazing game. The graphics and the story line is absolutely fantastic. It's one of those games that you have to play more than once just because of how good the story is and you might miss something the first time you play it. I just finished the first episode of the DLC and it is fantastic. Short but thats what you get when you are getting it in episodes. I can't wait for the next one and hopefully it is a good story.

Bioshock 1 was nice but in essence was just shooter. Bioshock 2 could have just as well been a DLC for Bioshock 1 and Bioshock 2 really bored me after the first quarter of the game.

Bioshock Infinite on the other hand has a living breathing world. Parts where you meet people who are not fighting you. It is a shooter with a pinch of RPG in it.

The story is excellent. It did not bore me at any point in the game.

But the one thing that really blew my mind where the light shafts. I know its just a graphical addition but it is light shafts done right which i have not seen very often. This is also one of the things that annoys me about skyrim.

->Super Story
->Super Grafik
->Spielmechanik, wie immer bei Bioshock gut

=>Spiel des Jahres!!!
Unbedingt spielen!!!
Absolutely loved this game, graphics are fantastic.  A great follow up from the previous Bioshock games.

This game is truly great. I haven't had it for a week and have managed to devote enough time to it to play it though on 3 difficulties. Is it a fast campaign? No, but I played it day in, day out, and am currently downloading all of the DLC. Highly reccommended.
My favourite game,the best story ever and amazing graphics.

En mi opinión, una obra maestra.

Empiezas sin saber quien eres siquiera, mil misterios por resolver ¿Que es Columbia? ¿Quien es la chica a la que buscas? ¿Quien es DeWitt? Te verás planteandote mil teorias sobre cada uno de esos misterios mientras revientas cabezas combinando armas y plasmid... digooo vigorizadores.

La jugabilidad está bastante bien equilibrada, especialmente si juegas en la mayor dificultad (Totalmente recomendado no jugar en fácil) y además es bastante divertida, en más de una ocasión las pasaras pvtas para sobrevivir a las oleadas de enemigos.

Otro punto fuerte mas del juego es su arte. Tiene un look muy característico bastante simple a la vez que detallado. Los personajes tienen unos diseños brutales. La atmosfera creada en todo momento es la que pide la acción gracias a los efectos de sonidos tán logrados y la música tan buena.

En fín, creo que no se me ocurre nada malo que decir de este juego... Un must have en toda regla.
Отключился от реальности.. Игра на столько захватывает, что ты не замечаешь что происходит вокруг монитора..Даже если взорвут планету во время твоего первого прохождения, ты не заметишь этого.

Out of all the games that I have played, BioShock Infinite stands out as one of the greatest and most impactful. The gameplay is solid with strong shooting mechanics with the Vigors adding an amazing amount of depth to the combat. The SkyHook makes the gameplay stand out from most games. But incredibly, this is one of the few games I felt never sacrificed story for the gameplay nor gameplay for the story. They were incredibly co-equal in the expirience. The story was enthralling and tense and the ending was one of the most incredible conclusions in storytelling. A definite buy thats worth the money.
Truly beautiful game, well worth the money. Gameplay is well balanced and challenging, and it looks like a work of art: no complaints at all =)
This is game is a beautiful piece of art. I highly recommend it to any gamer seeking a wonderful storyline as well as great gameplay.

One of the best games I've ever played!
Gameplay is fun and easy!
Visual looks stunning!
Story is unforgettable!
I recommend to all!!!

Роскошная, увлекательная, местами заставляющая думать и сопереживать главным персонажам. 
Прекрасная история, рассказанная нам при помощи самых современных приемов в игровой индустрии, зачастую появившихся именно в серии Bioshock.
Стоит сыграть! :)

Great story! Great gameplay, music and swartz humor. A bit to bloody and weird at time for me, but the story is to exciting that I care about that. Buy the game, and the DLC's when you have decided that you like it too.

Very good game, one of the best (if not the best !) game of the past year ! Great graphics, great script, Columbia is one of the most beautiful cities i've ever seen in video games (Rapture is not far) ! Though, if you want to buy the DLCs, take the season pass, 'cause Burial at Sea ep.1 is a total joke ($15 for two hours of playing, come on !). Hopefully the second episode will be better, but maybe you should wait until it's released... Anyway, the main game is genius, so don't hesitate to buy it and enjoy ! :-)
Amazing!
Easily the PC game of the year for 2013, this is a great game that looks stunning. And it's still great in 2017.

Hands down the best story line you'll probably ever come across in any game ever. Probably better than the vast majority of books and movies out there as well. The gameplay is also really fun and quite challenging, and the graphics are exceptional! Do yourself a favour...

Muy bueno de principio a fin.Quizas un poco repetitivo sobre todo las armas que no son nada interesantes en el sentido de todos los fps, lo mejor aqui es la historia. Elizabeth tiene un carisma muy grande. No quiero perderme ningun DLC

Para mí, el mejor juego de este año. El 1º lo probé en su momento y no me llegó a enganchar. Pero despues de pasarme este, voy a darles a los dos primeros una segunda oportunidad.
Me encanta recorrer los escenarios, con todos los detalles tan bien cuidados. Dan ganas de pasar y volver a pasar. Las habilidades, son una pasada, me encanta echar los cuervos y luego quemar a los enemigos.
La única pega que le encuentro es que podrían haber incluido un multijugador, con las habilidades, estaría bastante chulo. 
Por lo demás, recomendable 100%
The incredible story and challenging and complex themes more than make up for the slightly monotonous gameplay and any overall inconsistencies in the world. 9.8/10

If you can get this on special it is worth picking up. I don't think that the gameplay is really good enough to warrant the $60 price tag though. The game is shiny, but it just isn't really fun to go around killing stuff in it.
Просто шедевр! Думаю, этим всё сказано.

Ah yet another Bioshock. Let me just start off by saying it is a great game but i do not see where all the hype comes from. I love the classical universe they've created with the music, lighting, scenery, and effects. The gameplay is pretty fun though for somthing that's concidered an "RPG" like shooter it needs more depth in terms of prodcution quality and gameplay mechanics. Not to belittle the game it's most definetely one of the top First Person Shooters on the market today. Now the story, though filled with plot holes, is something else. The story starts off very slow because they throw you in this random universe and in the middle of a story; I was left what the hell was going on for a good quarter of the game till I assumed it'll all be explained as i go or in the end and for the most part it was. The ending was quite superb and had made the whole game worth playing twice over. Strongly reccomend this.
simplemente una palbra: juegazo

Amazing game, great graphics and definitly worth a play. The story line is great however quite short. 

9/10
Cool environment, cool action and a nice mindfucky ending! Gameplay is kinda repetitive so if the combat doesn't really tickle your fancy, your mileage may vary.

Bioshock Infinite is a reboot of the series IMHO, this time creating a wondrous city among the clouds.

STORY: Engrossing and intelligent.  You are a part of the story, trying to find out as much about the character you play as well as solving the mystery of Columbia.  It is one of the best integrated story experiences I've ever experienced.  And the ending will make you think... about everything you did on the way to the ending...

GRAPHICS: About 50 artists under strong artistic vision control produced one of the most viscerally real and coherent environments ever accomplished in an FPS.  It's eye-candy; it's a visual treat that will have you stop and admire the lush detail, well-themed work with respect and awe.  Epic updated the Unreal engine to make it push new limits.

AUDIO: Compelling ambient effects and environmental effects, good voice acting and tremendous period soundtrack.  I laughed the first time I heard "Girls just want to have fun" on a 1912 circus piano, but it turns out that was a subtle part of the plot (quantum timelines) - won't spoil it, play the game.  Only complaint is that 360 audio tunes out key dialogue if you turn away from the person, rather than on distance.

GAMEPLAY: Smooth, intuitive, well laid out, logical, no complaints.  NPC integration of Elizabeth makes her actually useful in combat as a support role.  Boss battles are balanced and sensical; but difficulty of Hard is actually Hard in this game.

The game felt short; it could have been longer, but you still end the game fulfilled.  You're still going to put 20 hours into it to finish it.

I don't have much time to play games anymore. But Bioshock Infinite is no ordinary game. It has a great story, with an epic ending. My time was not wasted as this is now one of the best games in my library. Highest recomendations!

It's "OK". That's about it, a decent FPS, don't get me wrong it's fairly enjoyable for the first playthrough, it's far too easy, even on the infamous "1999" difficulty, there's nearly no punishment for death and you can just plow through. The storyline is average, it's somewhat entertaining until the ending which feels like a real cop out, everyone who claims that it's "a smart game for smart gamers" needs to read a book or something, it trys to be clever and falls flat by straight up explaining what's going on to the player, removing any mystery or reason to invest time into understanding the story. It's a good fps, that's about it, it isn't "GOTY" it isn't one of the best games in recent years, it's just good.

Одна из самых захватывающих игр, в которые я когда-нибудь играл. Такая игра захватывает и не отпускает до самого конца. Конец оригинальной игры вызвал бурю эмоций и поставил огромую кучу вопросов относительно того, что произошло дальше. Я никогда не думал, что в играх (а тем более шутерах) может быть такой закрученный сюжет, ведь даже не всякий фильм может похвастаться такой заворажающей историей. Игра рассчитана на довольно умного игрока, не в вмысле уровня игры, а в вмысле понимания сути сюжета. Кто-то может пройти и не понять, что хотели сказать разработчики. Можно пройти много игр, но такая игра как Bioshock Infinite запомниться на долго. Это одна из тех игр, которые могут проходиться несколько раз, и каждый раз это вызывает сильные чувства.
Сейчас я подведу итоги того, что мне понравилось, а что нет:
-Сюжет [10/10] (думаю тут объяснять нечего)
-Графика[9/10] (графика радует глаз, но некоторые моменты мне лично не понравились, а именно дождь (он выглядит по мне не очень). Но может я просто придираюсь)
-Дизаин уровней [9/10] (построение их мне понравилось, но при первом прохождении я иногда просто не понимал куда идти. А так всё отлично)
-Озвучка[10/10] (отличная озвучка от професиальных актёров, очень понравилось. Кто-то скажет "а вот русской озвучки нет", но русская озвучка по-моему испортила бы ощущение от игры)
-NPC[9/10] (на удивление разработчики не обманули - NPC действительно очень умные. И это относиться в первую очередь к Элизабет - я нигде не видел, чтобы напарник бежал перед тобой (и это относиться не только к скриптовым сценам, а вообще). Враги тоже довольно хорошие: не тупые, но не читерски точные , вообще разработчики нашли "золотую середину". Из минусов разве что их колличество под конец игры, но это как говориться кому как - меня это лично немного напрягало)
-Из минусов я могу отметить разве что: отсуствие мультиплеера (но отличный сюжет окупает этот недостаток), и довольно таки большой вес: мой биошок со всеми длц на данный момент весит ~30 гб, но людей с быстрым интернетом это не дожно особо волновать.
Я рекомендую эту игру всем, кто хочет получить удовольствие от прохождения хорошей игры, и через долгий промежуток времени вспоминать об этом, как о отлично проведённом времени.
